attributes.action: Food vouchers for gluten free food for coeliac disease or benefits for food shop
attributes.additional_details:
Coeliac disease isn’t a choice it’s an autoimmune disease the gluten free diet is not an option. 

Most people in the cost of living crisis cannot afford food shopping never mind gluten free food shopping which is double the price.

This is causing further health issues which cost the NHS more because people cannot afford gluten free food and will then go for the cheaper alternative which isn’t gluten free which will then cause more health issues or develop eating disorders.
attributes.background:
Food vouchers or allow benefits for gluten free food shopping.

There also needs to be more places that does gluten free food for example restaurants, shopping centres such as Mac Donald’s, Greggs ,KFC .

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for the same action:

Voucher scheme for people with diagnosed dietary requirements:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/638905
